name: Deer in the Headlights
description:
Deer in the Headlights is a game about the strained relationship between a young deer and her dad as they drive to the airport. Navigate through a branched narrative to try and repair their relationship (or not).

FEATURES

- 6 unlockable endings
- full voice acting for each dialogue
- beautifully rotoscoped artwork
- original dad rock soundtrack

~^~^~^~^~^~^~^~^~^~^~^~^~^~^~

CREDITS

Writing & Voice Acting: Ivy Dupler
UI Design & Additional Art: Ruthie Edwards
Art & Voice Acting: Francisco Gonzalez
Music & Sound: Gautam Srikishan
Programming: Aaron Zemach

~^~^~^~^~^~^~^~^~^~^~^~^~^~^~

SPECIAL THANKS

NYU Game Center - jam host
Chevy Ray - pixel font

~^~^~^~^~^~^~^~^~^~^~^~^~^~^~
